statements: SELECT * FROM daily_calorie_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, calorie_intake FROM daily_calorie_data WHERE calorie_intake > 2000;
SELECT date, calorie_expenditure FROM daily_calorie_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT AVG(calorie_intake) AS average_calories FROM daily_calorie_data;
SELECT * FROM daily_calorie_data WHERE user_id = 2 AND date = '2021-10-15';
SELECT user_id, date, calorie_intake FROM daily_calorie_data WHERE calorie_intake > 200 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT calorie_intake, calorie_expenditure FROM daily_calorie_data WHERE calorie_intake < 150 AND calorie_expenditure > 100 ORDER BY calorie_intake ASC, user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, calorie_intake, calorie_expenditure FROM daily_calorie_data WHERE user_id = 3 OR user_id = 5 ORDER BY user_id, calorie_intake DESC;
SELECT * FROM daily_calorie_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-01-31' ORDER BY calorie_expenditure DESC, calorie_intake ASC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(calorie_intake) AS total_calories_intake FROM daily_calorie_data GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_calories_intake > 1000 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM daily_calorie_intake;
SELECT user_id, date, calorie_intake FROM daily_calorie_intake WHERE user_id = 'user1';
SELECT * FROM daily_calorie_expenditure WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT user_id, SUM(calorie_intake) AS total_calories_intake FROM daily_calorie_intake GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT dci.user_id, dci.date, dci.calorie_intake, dce.calorie_expenditure FROM daily_calorie_intake dci JOIN daily_calorie_expenditure dce ON dci.user_id = dce.user_id AND dci.date = dce.date;
SELECT user_id, calorie_intake, date FROM daily_calorie_intake WHERE calorie_intake > 200 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT user_id, calorie_intake, date FROM daily_calorie_intake WHERE calorie_intake < 1000 ORDER BY user_id ASC
SELECT user_id, SUM(calorie_intake) AS total_calorie_intake FROM daily_calorie_intake GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_calorie_intake > 1500
SELECT user_id, date FROM daily_calorie_intake WHERE date = '2021-10-15' UNION SELECT user_id, date FROM daily_calorie_expenditure WHERE calorie_expenditure < 500
SELECT user_id, date FROM daily_calorie_intake WHERE calorie_intake > (SELECT AVG(calorie_intake) FROM daily_calorie_intake) ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT * FROM daily_calorie_intake;
SELECT user_id, date, total_calories FROM daily_calorie_expenditure WHERE total_calories_burned > 500;
SELECT date, total_calories_burned FROM daily_calorie_expenditure ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT user_id, steps_count, heart_rate FROM wearable_device_data WHERE date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT device_id, steps_count FROM wearable_device_data ORDER BY steps_count DESC, date ASC;
SELECT total_calories FROM daily_calorie_intake WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT date, total_calories_burned FROM daily_calorie_expenditure WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT user_id, MAX(total_calories) AS max_calories FROM daily_calorie_intake GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, SUM(steps_count) AS total_steps FROM wearable_device_data GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM wearable_device_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM customer
SELECT name, age FROM customer WHERE age > 30
SELECT customer_id, SUM(calories_consumed) AS total_calories FROM daily_calorie_intake GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT customer_id, date, calories_burned FROM daily_calorie_expenditure ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT customer_id, manufacturer FROM wearable_device WHERE device_type = 'Fitbit'
SELECT customer_id, calories_consumed, date FROM daily_calorie_intake WHERE customer_id = '1234' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT wearable_id, device_type, manufacturer FROM wearable_device WHERE customer_id = '5678' ORDER BY manufacturer, wearable_id;
SELECT customer_id, name, age FROM customer WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, calories_consumed, date FROM daily_calorie_intake WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' AND calories_consumed > 2000;
SELECT c.customer_id, c.name, w.manufacturer FROM customer c JOIN wearable_device w ON c.customer_id = w.customer_id WHERE w.device_type = 'Fitbit';
SELECT * FROM daily_calorie_intake;
SELECT user_id, date, calorie_intake FROM daily_calorie_expenditure ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT user_id, name, age, gender FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM wearable_devices WHERE manufacturer = 'Apple';
SELECT report_id, report_type, report_data FROM reports WHERE report_type = 'weekly' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY age DESC, name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, name, age, gender FROM users WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female' ORDER BY name;
SELECT user_id, SUM(calorie_intake) AS total_calorie_intake FROM daily_calorie_intake GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_calorie_intake > 2000;
SELECT u.name, d.device_type, d.manufacturer FROM users u JOIN wearable_devices d ON u.user_id = d.user_id WHERE d.device_type = 'Fitness Tracker';
SELECT r.user_id, r.date, r.report_type, JSON_EXTRACT(report_data, '$.steps') AS steps_count FROM reports r WHERE r.report_type = 'Steps' ORDER BY steps_count DESC;
